name: Al Awwal
description: Al Awwal is one of the names of Allah in Islam, meaning 'The First.' It signifies that Allah is the first and has no beginning, emphasizing His eternal and timeless nature.
summary: The name Al Awwal illustrates Allah's precedence over all creation, indicating that everything else comes after Him in existence. It serves to remind believers of His sovereignty and the notion that He transcends time and sequence.
